name: Avoid having variable with a too long  name (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Sections with variable names that are too long. A name is considered too long if it has more than 20 characters.
output:
"This report lists all the Sections with variable names that are too long.

This QR provides the following information:
Section full name."
rationale: Source code containing long variable names is difficult to read and therefore to maintain.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of artifacts with variable names that are too long.
